metadata.description: Comprehensive Repository Update Template for Product Feature Readiness Database
metadata.notes: This template demonstrates all CRUD operations for autonomous vehicle capability management. Now includes optional document_url field for documentation links.

entities.name: Autonomous Emergency Braking
entities.success_criteria: Detect and respond to emergency situations with <200ms reaction time and 99.9% collision avoidance rate
entities.tmos: Achieve Level 4 autonomous emergency response capability

entities.name: Emergency Response System
entities.description: Comprehensive emergency detection and response system for autonomous vehicles
entities.label: PF-SAFETY-2.1
entities.tmos: Enable fully autonomous emergency response with zero human intervention

entities.name: Collision Prediction Algorithm
entities.description: Advanced ML algorithm for predicting potential collision scenarios
entities.success_criteria: Predict collisions with 99.8% accuracy at least 2 seconds before impact
entities.tmos: Real-time collision prediction with sub-second response

entities.name: Emergency Brake Controller
entities.description: Hardware controller for executing emergency braking maneuvers
entities.success_criteria: Execute emergency braking within 150ms of trigger signal

entities.name: Terberg: Driver-in operations (semi-trailer)
entities.description: Updated: Enhanced forward operations with improved safety protocols and driver assistance features

entities.name: Sensor Fusion
entities.success_criteria: Updated: Integrate LiDAR, camera, and radar data with 99.7% accuracy and <50ms latency

entities.name: Lane Detection
entities.description: Updated: Enhanced lane detection with improved performance in adverse weather conditions
entities.success_criteria: Updated: Detect lane markings with 99.9% accuracy in all weather conditions including rain, snow, and fog

entities.name: Predictive Maintenance
entities.success_criteria: Predict vehicle maintenance needs with 95% accuracy and 30-day advance notice
